data/hyperspace.xml$/FTL/ships/shipIcons:
AUTOMATED:
This enemy is automated, meaning it cannot be crew-killed. Systems act as though they are manned, and repairs will be made automatically. Breaches will prevent repairs in the affected room.

AUTO OVERRIDE:
This enemy is also protected by an automated mode that will take over if all of the crew are dead. If auto-mode activates, the ship will gain all benefits that Auto-ships receive. It is impossible to neutralize this vessel via crew kill.

HIGH LEVEL THREAT:
This enemy might pose a major threat to an unprepared vessel. Think carefully if this is an enemy you want to face, and keep your engines ready to run if things go south.

MAJOR LEVEL THREAT:
Avoid conflict with this enemy at all costs. You have a higher chance of slaying god than this ship.

LOW LEVEL THREAT:
This enemy poses very little threat to your vessel. Feel free to disregard any threats made by the captain of this sorry ship.

SPECIAL WEAPON:
This enemy is carrying a special custom-built weapon or drone. Destroying the vessel only has a 50% chance to drop the item, but killing the crew will guarantee it drops.

STATION:
This enemy is a station, meaning it has zero evasion without cloaking.

RESISTANT ROOMS:
This enemy has one or more resistant rooms, marked by the grey border and R icon in the top left. Resistant rooms will take no system damage from weapons, but can be damaged by crew and fires. Resistant rooms will take ion and hull damage as normal.

DEPRESSURIZED:
This enemy is depressurized, meaning it has no Oxygen system. Oxygen restoring crew such as Orchids will not be able to fill this ship with oxygen. Boarding with aerobic crew is not advised without proper precautions.

INVASION TACTICS:
This enemy uses special boarding tactics. Rather than teleporting back crew at low health, it will prioritize sending in more crew instead.

EDUTAINMENT:
The malfunctioning Auto is programmed to periodically ask you mathematical questions. Getting these questions wrong could lead to dangerous results, so be careful!

SHIELD BOOSTER:
This enemy's shields recharge 17% quicker.

ENGINE BOOSTER:
This enemy's engines charge up 30% faster.

AUTO RELOADER:
This enemy's weapons charge 10% faster.

RECONSTRUCTIVE TELEPORTER:
This enemy's crew heal to full every time they teleport.

RESPIRATORS:
This enemy's crew suffocate at half speed.

ION FIELD:
This enemy has a 50% chance to resist all ion damage.

BACKUP DNA:
This enemy's crew will be kept alive in the Clone Bay even if it is destroyed or hacked.

MED-BOTS:
This enemy's crew will passively heal anywhere on their ship so long as their Medbay is powered, but at 25% speed. Will get stronger with more power in their Medbay system.

DRONE BOOSTER:
This enemy's crew drones are granted double movement speed and a 50% boost to combat/sabotage damage and repair/extinguishing speed.

DEFENSE SCRAMBLER:
This enemy will jam your Defense Drones, making them incapable of firing. Is only active so long as the enemy Hacking system is functional - destroy it for your drones to return to normal.

TITANIUM SYSTEM CASING:
Your crew will sabotage this enemy's systems 60% slower. These systems also have a 15% chance to resist direct damage.

EMANCIPATION GRID:
This enemy's systems are extra protected from Ghost erosion, reducing their sabotage damage by 20%. If a door system is present, all crew and drones (including anaerobic crew) will take a base damage of 4hp/s with an extra 1hp for each level of Door Control above 1.

PHEROMONES:
This enemy ship is filled with pheromones. For each active power bar in Oxygen, their crew get a bonus 25% movement speed and 6.25% maximum health.

SYNTHETIC PHEROMONES:
This enemy ship is filled with unstable pheromones. For each active power bar in Oxygen, their crew get a bonus 15% combat damage. Each level above 1 reduces repair speed by 25%.

SUZERAIN PHEROMONES:
This enemy ship is filled with superior pheromones. For each active power bar in Oxygen, their crew get a bonus 33% movement speed and 15% reduced ability cooldowns.

ENERGY BYPASS:
This enemy can teleport crew or bombs, and mind control through Energy Shields. Its ordinary projectiles will still be unable to penetrate through.

ENERGY SHIELD:
This enemy is protected by an Energy Shield. Hacking, Mind Control, boarding drones, teleportation, and all hull-damaging and/or ion weapons will all be blocked until disabled.

KERNEL GREENHOUSE:
This enemy possesses an on-board greenhouse, which gives it a 65% chance to not use ammunition when firing its weapons.

SPORE DISPENSARY:
This enemy pollutes its air with toxic spores, which will make enemy boarders take 20% more damage from all sources.

TOXIC GAS:
This enemy ship is filled with a deadly neurotoxin which will passively damage your crew over time. Shells and Vampweeds are immune.

EXPEDITIVE GAS:
This enemy ship is filled with a deadly neurotoxin which will passively damage your crew over time. While the enemy Medbay is powered, their crew will heal at 90% speed of level 1 Medbay outside of it. Shells and Vampweeds are immune to the damaging properties of the gas.

NANITE GAS:
This enemy ship is filled with a deadly neurotoxin which will passively damage your crew over time. Actively puts out fires and repairs breaches on the enemy ship. Shells and Vampweeds are immune to the damaging properties of the gas.

NEURAL DISRUPTOR:
All crew in the room during this enemy's hacking pulse will be stunned.

BREACH SEALANT:
Breaches on this enemy will automatically be repaired even in the absence of crew. Also provides 35% combat resistance and 50% hazard resistance in empty rooms.

SHADOW WEAPONRY:
This enemy can fire while cloaked without a penalty to its duration.

CRYSTALLINE ARMOR:
Every time you deal hull damage to this enemy with your weapons, there is a 33% chance that a shard will break off and fly towards your ship. It will not pierce any shields, but will do 1 damage to a random room if it hits.

EXTINGUISHERS:
Fires aboard this enemy will be automatically (and slowly) extinguished even in the absence of crew.

ROCK PLATING:
The unique armor on this enemy grants it a 17% chance to resist hull damage from your weapons.

REGENERATIVE PLATING:
The unique armor on this enemy grants it a 10% chance to resist hull damage, and will automatically repair breaches even in the absence of crew.

SODIUM PLATING:
The unique armor on this enemy makes it resilient to ion damage. Additionally, it has a very minor chance of resisting system damage.

DIVINE ARMOR:
Extremely strong armor reinforced with Aether harvested from precursor ruins, fused with the already resistant armor of the Rockmen. Has a 70% chance to resist hull damage, but cannot resist breach weapons.
